import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; const EditAccount = (props) => { const {show, handleClose, dataEditAccount, handleAccountEdit} = props const handleEditAccount = async () => { let res = await editAccount(name, phone) if (res && res.updatedAt) { handleAccountEdit({ name: name, id: dataEditAccount.id }) handleClose() toast.success("Update successful!!!") } } return( Edit Accounts
setUserData(e.target.value)}/>

) } export default EditAccount
